alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 7:24PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Coleman, northwestern McCulloch, southeastern Runnels and northeastern Concho Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 724 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paint Rock, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paint Rock, Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina, Voss, Stacy, Leaday, Doole, Millersview, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 765 and The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
